summary: The meeting provided a tutorial on how to test a webcam and microphone in Zoom. Participants learned the steps to join a test meeting and check their audio and video settings before an actual meeting.
key_points: Participants need to have Zoom downloaded and installed to join a test meeting.
The test meeting can be accessed via zoom.com/test.
Users can select their camera and test audio output through speakers or headphones.
Microphone functionality can also be tested and adjusted during the session.
The test meeting will automatically close after the testing is completed.

action_items.task: Join a test meeting to check webcam and microphone settings.

next_steps: Participants should follow the outlined steps to ensure their equipment is functioning properly before future meetings.
